mapper.insert: insert into reply set par_id=(select id from board where id=#{param1}) , content=#{param2} , writer=(select id from member where userid=#{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.content, b.userid, a.created FROM reply a JOIN member b ON a.writer = b.id JOIN board c ON a.par_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{param1}
